body: Yes, you can avoid the requirement on installing distutils if you specify `-DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR` (we [use distutils](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/99284f4c9eff4bf387dea926c11e06bc513606e7/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_python.cmake#L21) to discover that directory automatically, but won't use it if you specify a dir explicitly).
